name: SIGMABET. [Early Demo]
description:
SIGMABET. is a typing adventure RPG that refuses to use a mouse.

Everything that is to be done: moving, attacking, crafting, farming, cooking, and more, are done solely using the keyboard.

Due to this restrictions, SIGMABET. will only be available on PC.

The goal of this early demo is to gather feedbacks regarding the controls and core gameplay.

Expected Play Time: 
  • To finish the demo only: 20 minutes.
  • To finish the dungeon included: 60 minutes.

Note: As this version is an early demo, many functionalities are yet to be implemented such as audio and saving. There is no sound whatsoever in this version.

Pro: The player's typing speed will improve.

Con: Gameplay might be difficult if the player is a slow typer. However, the game is adjusted so it is still easy.
